nodes.text: The Kaasban Sea was a sea located on the planet Sakiya in Hutt Space. The shanty town of Iepatap Harbor was built inside a tiny cove on the sea's northern shore.
The Kaasban Sea was introduced in the 2015 Star Wars Roleplaying sourcebook Lords of Nal Hutta, a part of the Star Wars: Edge of the Empire roleplaying game system published by Fantasy Flight Games.
